nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.elements
Interface MemberService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
MemberServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
MemberServiceImpl, MemberServiceSecurity
public interface MemberService
extends Service

Service interface for members. This service is used to control all member operations that are directly related to the member like loans, permissions and groups.

Author:
rafael, luis

Method Summary
 ActivitiesVO getActivities(Member member)
          Returns statistical data regarding the activities of the specified member.
 QuickAccessVO getQuickAccess()
          Returns the visible quick access items for the logged member or operator
 ISmsContext getSmsContext(Member member)
          Returns the sms context for the given member
 MemberStatusVO getStatus()
          Returns the status for the logged member or operator
